remarks.format: ## Remarks 字体样式指字体的倾斜度： 普通、 斜体和倾斜。A font style refers to the slant of a font: normal, italic, and oblique. |字体样式Font style|描述Description| |----------------|-----------------| |普通Normal|正常的或 roman，字体中的字符将竖向。The characters in a normal, or roman, font are upright.| |斜体Italic|斜体字体中的字符真正倾斜，并显示按设计。The characters in an italic font are truly slanted and appear as they were designed.| |倾斜Oblique|倾斜字体中的字符是人为倾斜The characters in an oblique font are artificially slanted| 有关，倾斜度通过普通字体中的字符进行切变转换获得。For , the slant is achieved by performing a shear transformation on the characters from a normal font. 不在计算机或打印机上提供 true 倾斜字体时，可以从普通字体生成倾斜样式，并将其用于模拟倾斜字体中。When a true italic font is not available on a computer or printer, an oblique style can be generated from the normal font and used to simulate an italic font. 下图显示使用字体的普通、 斜体和倾斜字体样式。The following illustration shows the normal, italic, and oblique font styles for the Palatino Linotype font. 请注意如何倾斜字体样式有更平滑和具有视觉冲击力的比倾斜字体样式，只需创建的倾斜普通字体样式版本的文本外观。Notice how the italic font style has a more flowing and visually appealing appearance than the oblique font style, which is simply created by skewing the normal font style version of the text. ![普通、 斜体和倾斜字体样式](~/add/media/fontstyle01.PNG "普通、 斜体和倾斜字体样式")![normal, italic, and oblique font styles](~/add/media/fontstyle01.PNG "normal, italic, and oblique font styles") 字体样式的示例Example of font styles ## Examples 在下面的代码示例中， ， ，和用于定义的字体样式对象。In the following code example, , , and are used to define the font styles for the objects.
